doc.plot: After the United States loses World War III, the U.S. is occupied by a fascist military regime and all U.S. citizens are given numbers in place of names. Number 3209, Ivan Verinoski, is accused of showing public support for pro-rebel groups and must plead his case to local military officers.

After the United States loses World War III, the U.S. is occupied by a fascist military regime and all U.S. citizens are given numbers in place of names. Number 3209, Ivan Verinoski, is accused of showing public support for pro-rebel groups and must plead his case to local military officers.
